header_text: You have a busy week ahead, so you sit down to write a to-do list. You notice your handwriting doesn't look as neat as it has always been, which concerns you. You consider that if your writing worsens over time, technology will help you adapt.

elements.Text: If your handwriting gets worse, you will...
